page.title: 02The weather in Heathylee
page.content:
The weather is very important because it affects everything.
In snow it affects farming because the farmer has to feed the animals because there is no grass when it is buried in snow. The farmer feeds them hay and a lot of farmers have milk cows and they have to get the milk out and a lot of farmers have long lanes and they fill up with snow. The farmer has to dig it out with a shovel or digger. If he can't clear the lane, the farmer has to take the milk to Bill Johnson's - that is the main pick-up place.
